ref: In order to provide the tagger with some information about the case of prepositions, a second training corpus was created in which prepositions which always select the same case, such as durch (through), were annotated with this case (APPR.Acc).
Unfortunately, the POS trigram consisting of the tags of the first three words does not occur in the Tiger corpus.
Results for 2 and for 10 preceding POS tags as context are reported for our tagger.
